title: Green Additive Manufacturing Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop focusing on sustainable materials and eco-friendly 3D printing techniques. Participants will learn about biodegradable filaments and energy-efficient printing methods.
content_markdown:
## Sustainable 3D Printing Workshop

Join us for an intensive hands-on workshop exploring the latest advances in **green additive manufacturing** technologies and practices.

## Workshop Topics

- Biodegradable and sustainable filament materials
- Energy-efficient 3D printing techniques
- Life cycle assessment of printed products
- Recycling and material reuse strategies
- Case studies from industry leaders

## Hands-On Activities

Participants will have the opportunity to:

1. **Test sustainable materials** on professional 3D printers
2. **Compare energy consumption** across different printing methods
3. **Design eco-friendly products** using CAD software
4. **Analyze environmental impact** of manufacturing processes

### Who Should Attend

- Engineering students and educators
- Sustainability professionals
- Additive manufacturing enthusiasts
- Industry representatives

**Limited seats available!** Register early to secure your spot.

*All materials and equipment provided.*
